page.title: Assurance of Salvation
page.verse: And this is the testimony: God gave us eternal life, and this life is in his Son. Whoever has the Son has life; whoever does not have the Son of God does not have life.

page.title: Assurance of Answered Prayer
page.verse: Until now you have not asked for anything in my name. Ask and you will receive, so that your joy may be complete.

page.title: Assurance of Victory
page.verse: No testing has overtaken you that is not common to everyone. God is faithful, and he will not let you be tested beyond your strength, but with the testing he will also provide the way out so that you may be able to endure it.

page.title: Assurance of Forgiveness
page.verse: If we confess our sins, he who is faithful and just will forgive us our sins and cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

page.title: Assurance of Guidance
page.verse: Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and do not rely on your own insight. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make straight your paths.

page.title: Christ the Center
page.verse: This means that anyone who belongs to Christ has become a new person. The old life is gone; a new life has begun.

page.title: God's Word
page.verse: All Scripture is inspired by God and is useful to teach us what is true and to make us realize what is wrong in our lives. It corrects us when we are wrong and teaches us to do what is right.

page.title: Fellowship
page.verse: Let us think of ways to motivate one another to acts of love and good works. 25 And let us not neglect our meeting together, as some people do, but encourage one another, especially now that the day of his return is drawing near.

page.title: Obedience to Christ
page.verse: And so, dear brothers and sisters,a I plead with you to give your bodies to God because of all he has done for you. Let them be a living and holy sacrifice—the kind he will find acceptable. This is truly the way to worship him.

page.title: Prayer
page.verse: If you abide in Me, and My words abide in you, you will ask what you desire, and it shall be done for you.

page.title: Witnessing
page.verse: Jesus called out to them, "Come, follow me, and I will show you how to fish for people."

page.title: All Have Sinned
page.verse: For everyone has sinned; we all fall short of God’s glorious standard.

page.title: Christ Paid the Penalty
page.verse: But God showed his great love for us by sending Christ to die for us while we were still sinners.

page.title: Must Receive Christ
page.verse: But to all who believed him and accepted him, he gave the right to become children of God.

page.title: Sin's Penalty
page.verse: For the wages of sin is death, but the free gift of God is eternal life through Christ Jesus our Lord.

page.title: Salvation Not By Works
page.verse: God saved you by his grace when you believed. And you can’t take credit for this; it is a gift from God. 9 Salvation is not a reward for the good things we have done, so none of us can boast about it.

page.title: Assurance of Salvation
page.verse: I have written this to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, so that you may know you have eternal life.
